description: APPLICATION FOR A LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT CERTIFICATE FOR THE PROPOSED ERECTION OF NEW DORMER WINDOWS TO EXISTING ROOF CONVERSION. INSTALLATION OF 1 x ROOFLIGHT TO FRONT SLOPE. DEMOLITION OF CHIMNEY.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The operations (erection of a rear roof extension) would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class B of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class B. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 2 - The operations (insertion of a roof light within the front roof slope) would consist of any other alteration to the roof of the dwelling house within the meaning of Class C of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class C. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 3 - The operations (removal of the existing chimney) would consist of any other alteration to the dwelling house within the meaning of Class G of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (Amendment) (No. 2) (England) Order 2008 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class G. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.
